::Killfest::

Killfest nods. "Allright, but lets be careful. We still have Hell
Beast out there, and the Maximals could attack too, though that's
doubtfull. Let's have one eye on the scanners."		


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Hmmm. I say we wait but keep track of the Trainers. As soon as this
> battle is over they will be weak. We strike then. We can also talk
with
> the Alliance then also."
